allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-Process -Name python* -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_CommandLine -like ''*streamlit*'' } | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 8510 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 8503 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; Write-Output ''DONE''")
